Type entry: Show this Journal entry on the Map About Settings Rate us View Introduction Privacy Policy About this app Version %s App Description This app is specifically designed to help you remember those magic moments in your life.\n\nWhether these occur when you are travelling on vacation, or just living your day to day life.\n\nMiTravels will help you keep a track of those events through journals, routes and photos. Privacy MiTravels is specifically designed to provide 100% privacy of all your content.\n\nYou will be the only person that can view your content.\n\nAll the data and journals that you enter are stored locally on your device and not uploaded anywher to the internet unless you specifically request this to happen through any share or backup feature (coming soon.)
MiTravels collects Your location data when you start a Journey, even when the App is closed or not in use.\n\nThis data is used so that you can follow your Journeys on our interactive Map.\n\nPlease select Allow on the following Permission dialogs to get the benefit from MiTravels. Permissions Credits Adrianna Calvo Cover Photo in Splash Screen (pexels.com)\nJess Bailey Designs (pexels.com)\nhttps://www.pexels.com/@jessbaileydesign\n\nIcons:\nfreepik(www.freepik.com) from www.flaticon.com \nsmalllikeart (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/smalllikeart)
Create your first Journey.\n\nDon\'t let those memories\nbe forgotten... Tap below to add your first journal entry... Tap here to Begin... SettingsActivity
GPS Sensitivity of GPS measurement Set the accuracy of GPS measurement. This attribute determines how often to mark a gps entry. The lower the number, the higher the accuracy, but will use more battery power Sort Order for Lists Sort Order for Journeys list Choose the order that you would like to sort your journeys in the home screen Sort Order for Journal entries Choose the order that you would like to sort your journal entries in th ehournal screen Tap to turn Location on to monitor your Journey.
